name: Breakout (itch) (AlphaExtraction)
description:
Breakout is a 4-player digital card game - a 1 versus 3 match. Three Escapees have to outsmart the Warden, find Elements, and with a bit of luck, defeat them. The Warden needs to contain the Escapees and prevent them from gathering the right Elements, and use traps to stop them.

https://playingcards.io/c5969f
